Posts.Content: Oct 6, 2011 10:52PM wacocop66 wrote: Thank God, I'm not crazy.  I've had costochondritis for probably 25 years, but after radiation treatments in Jan & Feb, I did not recognize it as such.  Do normal pain relievers help?  As I recall, they had me on anti-inflamatory drugs then.
Posts.Title: Muscle/joint pain after radiation? kat06365 Larai
